item.title: Join the Team
item.description:
We are always welcome brilliant and young mind join our lab and gain hands-on experience in applied economic research in agribusiness decision.

Graduate Students

We have available MS assistantship positions at our lab. Typically, the graduate students who receive assistantship in our lab need to be enrolled as a full time MS student in Agricultural nd Applied Economics program at Clemson University.

As members of our lab, you will collaborate closely with our faculty and graduate students on various studies focusing on agribusiness decision-making. You will gain knowledge on applied economic research method, data science, and decision sciences. From time to time, we will also collaborate across multi-displinary research groups to conduct research. We will provide both formal and informal training through group and individual meetings, conference and workshop attendance, and interactions with others in the lab and department.

To apply, please email a CV and a brief description of experience and career goals to Dr. Yefan Nian (ynian@clemson.edu) or Dr. Michael Vassalos (mvassal@clemson.edu). For full admission details, visit the Online Graduate Application. Please indicate your interest in working with Dr. Yefan Nian or Dr. Michael Vassalos in your application.

Undergraduate Students

We wlcome undegraudate students join our lab as a research assistant and gain hands on experience on conducting applied economic research related to decision-making in agribusiness. As a research assistant, you will collaborate closely with our faculty and graduate students on various projects. Your responsibilities could include participant recruitment, experimental preparation, data collection and analysis, and literature reviews.

To apply, please email a CV and a brief description of experience and career goals to Dr. Yefan Nian (ynian@clemson.edu) or Dr. Michael Vassalos (mvassal@clemson.edu).
